extensionDescription.message: Integra VPN in Firefox: exclude schedas, configura le position de sitos e altero!

back.description: Alternative text attribute for back button.

titleServerList.description: Title for a dialog where users can set the location for a website.

selectWebsiteLocation.message: Seliger le position del sito web

titlePageSettings.description: The header for website specific settings, i.e. exclude a page from VPN.

excludePageFor.message: Sempre disactivar le protection VPN pro $ORIGIN$
excludePageFor.description: Setting to exclude a website from VPN.

resetPageSettings.description: Button text to reset all site specific settings.

vpnIsOn.description: Header to signal that VPN connection is enabled.

vpnIsOff.description: Header to signal that VPN connection is disabled.

extensionVpnIsOff.message: Mozilla VPN es ancora active e protege le resto de tu computator.
extensionVpnIsOff.description: Popup subtitle when the extension VPN is off, but the client VPN is on.

vpnOffStatus.description: Label indicating that the VPN is off.

vpnOnStatus.description: Label indicating that the VPN is on.

placeholderSearchWebsites.description: Placeholder text for the search input field to search websites.

tableHeadingWebsite.description: Table heading for the column listing websites.

tableHeadingVpnStatus.description: Table heading for the column indicating whether the VPN is on or off for a website.

headlineNoWebsitePreferences.message: Tu non ha configurate alcun preferentias de sito web ancora
headlineNoWebsitePreferences.description: Headline shown when the user hasn’t set any website preferences.

noWebsitePreferencesSubText.message: Con le Firefox extension, tu pote disactivar le protection VPN pro specific sitos web, mantenente illo active pro toto le altero. Pro facer isto, visita un sito web, aperi le extension, e actualisa le preferentias del sito web.
noWebsitePreferencesSubText.description: Subtext shown when there are no website preferences set by the user.

altTextRemoveWebsiteButton.description: Alternative text for the button that removes a website rule from the list of preferences.

altTextOpenSettingsPage.description: Alternative text for the button that opens the Extensions Settings page.

searchServer.description: Placeholder for the Input field where users can search the list of servers.

btnSubscribeNow.description: Call to action button for users to subscribe to Mozilla VPN.

getHelp.description: Text of a link pointing to a relevant help page.

bodySignedOut.message: Tu es actualmente disconnectite del app Mozilla VPN. Pro usar le extension de Firefox Mozilla VPN, aperi le app sur tu computator e accede a tu conto.

headerNeedsUpdate.description: This is the headline of an error panel.

bodyNeedsUpdate2.message: Pro usar iste extension, primo discargar e installar le ultime app Mozilla VPN.
bodyNeedsUpdate2.description: This is body copy for an error message.

headerInstallMsg.description: Header if a VPN installation was not found.

bodyOpenMsg.message: Pro usar le extension de Firefox Mozilla VPN, per favor aperi le app Mozilla VPN primo.

bodyInstallMsg.message: Pro usar iste extension, primo discarga e installa le app Mozilla VPN sur tu computator.

bodyInstallMsgFooter.message: Nota que Mozilla VPN es un servicio de abonamento pagate.

btnDownloadNow.description: This is a call to action button to download the VPN.

defaultLocationHeader.message: Usar le position de Mozilla VPN.

useDefaultLocationExplainer.message: Usar le mesme position que Mozilla VPN app protegente iste computator.
useDefaultLocationExplainer.description: Explanation of what “Use default Mozilla VPN Location” means.

bodyUnsupportedOSMessage.message: Actualmente, le extension Mozilla VPN es solo disponibile sur apparatos Windows.

footnoteUnsupportedOSMessage.message: Nos labora pro apportar le supporto pro macOS e Linux tosto!

websiteProtection.description: A subtitle that is followed by an off icon and the word 'Off'.

learnMore.description: Label of link that leads to SUMO.

onboarding1_title.message: Disactivar le VPN pro specific sitos web

onboarding1_body.message: Con le extension de Firefox, tu pote disactivar le protection VPN pro specific sitos web, mantenente illo active pro toto le altero.

onboarding2_title.message: Vider differente sitos web ab positiones differente

onboarding2_body.message: Novas de London. Sports de Sancte Paulo. Compras de Tokyo. Configura positiones specific de sito web pro le navigation personalisate.

onboarding3_title.message: Mantener active la protection pro Firefox

onboarding3_body.message: Usar le extension pro activar le protection VPN pro Firefox, mesmo quando protection es disactivate pro le resto de tu computator.

next.description: Label of button to progress to next onboarding panel.

skip.description: Label of button to skip onboarding.

done.description: Label of button in final onboarding panel.

headerReEnableFirefoxProtection.description: Error panel title for when Firefox is an excluded app.

bodyReEnableFirefoxProtection.message: Firefox es actualmente un “app excludite” in le application Mozilla VPN. A usar iste extension, aperi le application e vade a parametros > Apps excludite e remove Firefox.

settingsPageSubtitle.message: A adder o cambiar le preferentias specific de sito web, visita le sito e aperi le Mozilla VPN Firefox extension. Pois, configura le preferentias pro le sito. Tu preferentias solo es active quando le protection VPN pro Firefox es active.

settingsPageTitle.message: Preferentias de sito web de Mozilla VPN

noSignal.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

unstable.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

connecting.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

offForWebsite.message: Mozilla VPN disactivate pro sito web

websiteLocationLabel.message: $SERVERLOCATION$: position del sito web de Mozilla VPN
websiteLocationLabel.description: Aria label for a flag icon representing the location of the VPN server

alert_conflictingProgram.message: Un programma sur tu computator pote causar problemas con le extension Mozilla VPN.

alert_conflictingExtensions.message: Altere extensiones pote interferer con como functiona le extension Mozilla VPN.

telemetry_toggle_text.message: Compartir datos technic e de interaction
telemetry_toggle_text.description: Label for the Telemetry Opt-In toggle

privacy_notice_link_name.message: Aviso de confidentialitate re le servicios de abonamento de Mozilla
privacy_notice_link_name.description: Used as text of the link in 'telemetry_screen_descr'

first-install-body.message: Pro adjutar nos a meliorar functiones e prestation, e resolver problemas rapidemente, tu pote seliger de permitter al extension Mozilla VPN de colliger datos. Le datos que nos collige jammais sera ligate a te e nos jammais colligera datos re le sitos que tu visita. Le collection de datos non ha impacto sur como le extension functiona.
first-install-body.description: Body copy on the telemetry consent screen

privacyPolicyIntro.message: Plen detalios del datos que nos collige es disponibile in nostre politica de confidentialitate.
privacyPolicyIntro.description: Description of what can be found in the privacy policy. Blurb in the telemetry consent screen.

thankYouForAdding.message: Gratias pro adder le extension Mozilla VPN
thankYouForAdding.description: Headline on the telemetry consent screen

toContinueToTheExtension.message: Pro continuar al extension, seliger Mozilla VPN in le barra del instrumentos de Firefox.
toContinueToTheExtension.description: Blurb at the bottom of the telemetry consent screen

optionalDataCollection.description: Subtitle on the telemetry consent screen

telemetryListHeader.message: Le datos optional que nos collige include:
telemetryListHeader.description: Headline for a list describing the type of data collected by the extension

technicalData.message: Datos technic, tal como version del navigator, version del extension, e detalios de error assi que nos pote traciar e reparar le errores efficientemente.
technicalData.description: Description of technical data, found on telemetry consent screen.

interactionData.message: Datos de interaction, tal como le numero de sitos web excludite de protection VPN, le numero de sitos web con un preferentia de position, e quanto sovente le protection es active e disactivate.
interactionData.description: Description of interaction data, found on the telemetry consent screen.

telemetryOptOutInstructions.message: Si tu non vole permitter al extension Mozilla VPN de colliger datos, dismarca le quadrato. Tu alsi pote cambiar iste parametro quando tu lo vole in le extension, sub Parametros.
telemetryOptOutInstructions.description: Opt out instructions on the telemetry consent screen

telemetryCheckboxLabel.message: Permitter a Mozilla de colliger datos technic e de interaction

telemetrySettingsCheckboxLabel.message: Iste datos adjuta nos a meliorar functiones e prestation. Isto include datos re tu apparato, configuration hardware, e como tu usa le extension Mozilla VPN.
telemetrySettingsCheckboxLabel.description: Checkbox label on the settings page

messageSplitTunnelHeader.description: Header that is shown if the current Firefox is affected by Split-Tunneling

messageSplitTunnelBody.message: Firefox es actualmente un “app excludite” in le application Mozilla VPN. A usar iste extension, aperi le application e vade a parametros > Apps excludite e remove Firefox.
messageSplitTunnelBody.description: Helptext body that is shown if the current Firefox is affected by Split-Tunneling
